channel.title: Help me! where is the scripting box?
channel.description:
WHERE IS THE BOX YOU ENTER CODES?????? :confused: Exp: spawn = 183427993439027993437279934401Candle shop Where do i put that? How do i make a shop and put npcs to operate the building?
ANd how do i make myself a mod or add.?

item.title: Help me! where is the scripting box?
item.dc:creator: @freezer_burn freezer burn
item.description:
@freezer_burn wrote:

go to your server in your documents and look for autospawn then hover your cursor over it to see if it says .ctf file or .cfg file

and if you want to make yourself a admin you need textpad 4.7 at www.textpad.com

and once you have it go into characters at your server in documents or wherver you saved it to find the file that says “characters” find your character and at the top it will say “player rights” change the number 0 to 3 and you are a admin.

Read full topic
item.source: Help me! where is the scripting box?
